name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Isaac Lewis BROWN, Appellant

judges: Before EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
JONES, former C. J., took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Isaac Lewis BROWN, Appellant.

opinions.text:
"OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
JONES, former C. J., took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Fred D. Furman, Philadelphia, for appellant.
F. Emmett Fitzpatrick, Dist. Atty., Steven H. Goldblatt, Asst. Dist. Atty., Chief, Appeals Div., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
368 A.2d 272
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Isaac Lewis BROWN, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania,
Submitted March 29, 1976.
Decided April 28, 1977.
Fred D. Furman, Philadelphia, for appellant.
F. Emmett Fitzpatrick, Dist. Atty., Steven H. Goldblatt, Asst. Dist. Atty., Chief, Appeals Div., for appellee.
Before EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
